item.title: One Step the U.S. Must Take to Restore the Navy
item.description: Shipyards exist to build ships, but without orders, nothing happens. It’s time for Congress to change that.

item.title: The Cost of ‘Common Sense’
item.description: Regulation should rest on evidence, not intuition.

item.title: Trump Administration Deports Another Alien to El Salvador in Violation of Court Order
item.description: It appears that the administration should be able to deport Jordin Melgar-Salmeron, but it’s shooting itself in the foot.

item.title: Art About Love of Country Rules the Headlines
item.description: At least at NR it does: A reborn triumphal arch in Brooklyn, America 250 in Venice, bias at the Smithsonian, and a sublime Canaletto on the auction bl...

item.title: New York Chooses Its Fate
item.description: Lurking behind Mamdani’s pie-in-the-sky socialist agenda is his abiding commitment to anti-Zionism. None of this bodes well for NYC.
